flawed_nl_solution:
First find the cost of two slices of bread: $0.15/slice * 2 slices = $<<0.15*2=0.34>>0.34
Then add the cost of one slice each of ham and cheese: $0.34 + $0.25 + $0.35 = $<<0.34+0.25+0.35=0.94>>0.94
